title: Epilepsy: first aid for seizures
creator_credit: Ernie Steck, Paul Eide and University of Minnesota
brief_description: Dispels the myths that surround epilepsy and informs on the facts. Provides information on how to recognise the various forms of epilepsy - petit mal, grand mal, partial seizure and post-ictal state. The treatment required for these various stages of epilepsy is also noted. Narrated by Mark frost. Suitable for middle and upper secondary and tertiary levels.
